Title: Relates to requiring employers to pay severance to employees when there is a plant closing, relocation, or mass layoff
Summary: Requires employers to pay a severance pay equal to one week of pay for each full year of employment to employees when there is a plant closing, relocation, or mass layoff.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring employers to pay severance to employees when there is a plant closing, relocation, or mass layoff
